title: On Champions:  Promises, Oaths, Zeal and Belief
description:
A supplement for the Pathfinder Second Edition system adding causes, devotion spells, feats, and more to the champion.

Includes all player-facing content, tables for both players and GMs to roll, and a journal for easy access to the book's contents.

vow.label: Vow
vow.description: Each vow has a power and a condition associated with it. All vow abilities have the stance trait alongside their existing traits. The powers often incentivize playstyles speci c to the cause the champion serves. Should the condition fail to be met, the champion becomes stunned 2 as the weight of their vow shatters against them in full force. Vows are magical abilities but cannot be dispelled or counteracted once in e ect, as the binding magic that enforces the tenets holds true divine power. Vows have no set duration, ending only at the end of a combat or until their condition is broken. While failing to uphold a vow does not immediately result in breaking your edicts and anathema, repeated failures may be considered the end of your service as a champion at GM discretion.

abjuration.label: Abjuration
abjuration.description: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.

conjuration.label: Conjuration
conjuration.description: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the conjuration school of magic, typically involving summoning, creation, teleportation, or moving things from place to place.

divination.label: Divination
divination.description: The divination school of magic typically involves obtaining or transferring information, or predicting events.

enchantment.label: Enchantment
enchantment.description: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the enchantment school of magic, typically involving mind control, emotion alteration, and other mental effects.

evocation.label: Evocation
evocation.description: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

necromancy.label: Necromancy
necromancy.description: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the necromancy school of magic, typically involving forces of life and death.

transmutation.label: Transmutation
transmutation.description: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the transmutation school of magic, typically changing something's form.
